targets.expr: sum(pbs_used{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name) / sum(pbs_size{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name)

sum(pbs_used{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name) / sum(pbs_size{host_system=~"$pbs_host_system", datastore=~"$pbs_datastore", vm_name=~"$pbs_guest"}) by (host_system,datastore,vm_id,vm_name)
sum(pbs_host_swap_used{job=~"pbs", host_system=~"$pbs_host_system"}) by (host_system) / sum(pbs_host_swap_total{job=~"pbs", host_system=~"$pbs_host_system"}) by (host_system)

list.description:
Not using for queries since using docker image on 'monitoring' host for Exporter - all instance IP addresses are therefore the same (only port differs. 
Using host_system instead (label applied by prometheus.yaml depending on scrape target.
list.label: PBS Instance
list.name: pbs_instance
